record.value: Trading Networks routing parameters. The following parameters should ideally be specified for non-XML content: - SenderID - ReceiverID - DocumentID - DoctypeName or some other parameter used to recognise the TN Document Type - $contentType
The mime type of the content being routed. For example text/xml for XML, or text/csv for CSV content etc

Trading Networks routing parameters. The following parameters should ideally be specified for non-XML content: - SenderID - ReceiverID - DocumentID - DoctypeName or some other parameter used to recognise the TN Document Type - $contentType

MAP.COMMENT: normalize pipeline arguments: EDIINT content handler will add a stream to the pipeline, default handler adds contentStream
